website_summaries.verdict: Strong, weather-resistant design at an affordable price.
pros: This attractive bench stands out for its rustproof construction that's reinforced to withstand lots of weight
Designed to hold up to everyday use without chipping, scratching, or peeling
cons: The vague assembly instructions make this bench difficult to put together

customer_reviews.title: Never buy it if u don’t want to keep a piece of rusty garbage at your yard !
customer_reviews.text: It is very bad ! because it is suppose to be a outdoor bench but it got rusty after only 2 times raining ! Unbelievable! I wish I can give it no star ! The yellow rusty water just non stop coming out from the holes on the chairs and make the ground all yellow, the rusty marks on the concrete are not able to be removed ! !! 😖 garbage !!!! 😤 I wish I could return it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: PARTS DON'T FIT, SEAT SIZE IS BIGGER THAN THE BACK PIECE.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was good and the bench looks good inside the house because that is the farthest it went, place where I tried to assemble it. The bolts for the back of the bench wont go in all the way since there is too much gap (see picture attached). I cant believe that it is not spec-ed out accurately. Disappointed that I will have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: SKhan

customer_reviews.title: (Was) Super annoyed!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I reached out to the company that actually makes this bench, Leigh Country. After reading multiple other reviews, the short backrest seems to be a reoccurring issue. I was advised to switch the leg pieces. This worked. The back piece fits perfect. So if you run into this problem, try flip flopping the legs. Beautiful chair! Recommend buying a cushion for it as well. Had this bench actually fit together and not have dents in it, it would have received 5 stars. The back piece is short by about two inches making it impossible to attach to the legs pieces. Very disappointing. And of course it's heavy and will be a pain to return. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Selway

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to put together. Just one thing is odd. The instructions show the bench for the front. The sides are labeled right and left. HOWEVER, they have the right side labeled left and the left labeled right. Didn't look close enough in the beginning and assumed (!) that the right arms/legs went on the right side. Absolutely will not fit that way! Quick look at the instructions, changed it around and everything fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Island Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bench outside for over three years and it still looks great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Good bench.
customer_reviews.text: ***Updated review April 2020***^ Bench still in great condition. Love it. I would highly recommend and will definitely purchase again. ***Updated Review April 2018*** This bench sits outside in the sun (we are in Hawaii). Direct sun light most of the day, but after 1 year (in rain and sun), it still looks great. I would highly recommend this bench and I would buy another one of these when I need one more. **Original review March 2017***** Very nice looking Bench. Sturdy. We live in Hawaii and the sun hits this bench every day, pretty much all day. It hasn't show any sigh of wear yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ai my me

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, strudy, strong. Not flimsy. Buy but read about the bolt problem
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars but the instructions are not well explanatory when it comes to the seating piece in depicting which way the beveled end goes. And one of the bolts for the back rest does not go through enough to be bolted. Looks like the frame is somewhat not welded straight/correctly. Fix to it would be buying a longer bolt. Other then that it came with two tools to tighten all bolts and nuts that fit . This item is very Sturdy. Very strong. And looks wonderful. The paint on it and the welcome sign are awesome. Lots of compliments . Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, STURDY and very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, STURDY and very easy to assemble! But, use a 10mm wrench and a crescent wrench, because the tools they provided would not fit on the nut that was painted. Don’t buy the wooden bench, it’s sloppy and will not hold any weight! This is $110 bucks well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Mike LasVegas

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged bench.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved the bench yesterday and although it is attractive, one of the legs is badly defective. It looks like it was damaged and then patched but the patch is done very poorly, it is rough and has very sharp edges. I am worried that my 2 year old will cut herself if she touches it. There was also a very small scratch on the back piece, but it is barely noticeable. I am going to contact customer service to see it they will send me a replacement leg, I will update my review with their response.
customer_reviews.author: LBOK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - it is not black but rather a dark bronze finish.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical ordering a bench online but this one arrived on time and was a cinch to assemble. So easy. It is beautiful and we have gotten a lot of comments on it. We have it outside a non-profit clinic (under an awning) and it will be used a lot. Also found a cushion for in at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa G.

customer_reviews.title: Does not rust and still strong
customer_reviews.text: I have this for more than 4 years now and still going strong. It does not rust. It is just hard to put at first. Nice metal and design as well
customer_reviews.author: Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is awesome! We wanted to purchase a metal bench because our dog managed to destroy any wicker / wood furniture we tried in the backyard. It was easy to assemble, and is super light weight so we can move it around when we have company over. At first, we were a little worried about the weight capacity because it really is super light for a bench, but after we threw a Labor Day party and had some heavier built people rest on it throughout the day we were happily reassured of the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: A Happy Ending to an Almost Disaster!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bench some time ago and was disappointed because the legs were uneven. I contacted the manufacturer in Texas and they sent out another left side unit, they had the same outcome. My husband then removed the plastic plug on the end of one of the legs, measured where the problem was and sawed of the extra material. The "Welcome Bench" now sits on my porch and provides a stopping point to rest or enjoy a sunny afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: EnJoyce

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy welcome bench...
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to say other than I have no complaints. It only took me about 15-20 minutes to put together. Once made, I moved it to the front of our house and honestly haven't sat it in much. It seems sturdy and is about as comfortable as any public bench. Perhaps it'd be better off with a cushion? The "WELCOME" sign on the backrest is easily legible and can be read from the sidewalk. The grid on the bottom may be a bit too wide for some, as you can actually feel them while sitting. In contrast, you don't even feel the shape of the letters on the backrest. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: jeffsterz

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when I received my new bench to replace my old dilapidated wood bench. My 16 year old son was able to put it together without any adult help. It looks great in front of my house. It is sturdy and well made and thus far has survived the hot Nevada weather. My only dislike was the faux paint job on the metal. From far away it's just fine and looks great. Close up its just different than I thought it would be. The bench has a red coppery paint job over it. Just so you are aware if you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: momma j

customer_reviews.title: Looks soooo nice outside by my entrance
customer_reviews.text: Looks soooo nice outside by my entrance. Received many compliments. Some difficulty putting together. Screw holes lined up but the last two screws were tough. We had to loosen and redo the screws and tighten evenly, little by little .
customer_reviews.author: JnJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our condo to have near the elevator for guests and those waiting for their ride. It looks great and was really easy to put together. Lightweight enough to move easily but solid to sit on and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The packaging was very beat up upon arrival. I looked like perhaps it had been put together and then sent back. Regardless, it was easy to assemble. It’s looks beautiful! Very happy I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, beautiful design, super quick shipping! I don't really get all the reviews about this being hard to put together. Maybe I got lucky, with everything aligning perfectly? I was worried about that based on reviews, and it only took me about 15 minutes alone, and I'm a girl sooooo :)
customer_reviews.author: Dini1068

customer_reviews.title: Did our research and for the $ a very good value
customer_reviews.text: Considering the delivered price at under $70 we consider this an excellent buy. Structurally we found it to be rigid and sound. The local Home Depot had a similar bench...no better...for $109. The instructions for assembly could have been more clear in establishing left vs right side but that was minor. Fit was ok but finish was lacking by way of paint blotching along the seating cross bars. The other good news is that our unit properly assembled was comfortable and quite stable in supporting our combined weight of 425 lbs
customer_reviews.author: chuck l

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but the back piece was too short...
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a very good looking piece, ours came with the "welcome back" piece that was a good 1.5 inches too short to screw in on one end! We had to go to Home Depot and buy a longer screw (nuts and washers too) to pull it together... after it was finally put together, we evened it out so that there is now a good half inch gap at the bottom of the back piece on both sides... we will have to buy a dark spray to cover the new silver bolt that we bought... but all in all it's a good bench.
customer_reviews.author: DAFS

customer_reviews.title: Great metal bench.
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about ordering a bench online, but I was surprised at how great it looks. It was super easy to assemble, only 8 bolts and it was together. I am a larger man and it could hold 3 of me. If you're looking for a good metal bench, look no farther. A great bench at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Lakin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Welcoming Bench
customer_reviews.text: Should pay special attention to mounting of end pieces & not on R & L stickers. Tighten all bolts "after" fully assembling. Goes together rather easily. And now sits on my front porch. Have received several compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Audie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bench
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench. Easy to put together and very sturdy. Looks great on our front porch. Also was delivered a day early which was very cool and doesn't happen as often as it used to.
customer_reviews.author: V. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and very easy to assemble only took 15 minutes. Will look good in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Roche

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and so cute!
customer_reviews.text: This bench took only a few minutes to assemble and it is sturdy and beautiful! It fits two adults comfortably. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: C17

customer_reviews.title: great looking - but needs a cushion if you want to use it.
customer_reviews.text: bench looks great - but to sit on it - better get a cushion. the bars are killer!
customer_reviews.author: topcat

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, yet sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bench! Much bigger than I expected. Pretty lightweight but definitely sturdy. Looks great in our front yard!
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: Very solid bench
customer_reviews.text: Bench is just what I needed for my new house. Very solid and does NOT make any noise. It was easy to assemble by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Despite what other have said, I had no trouble what so ever putting this together - all parts fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Meshaw

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Well made for the price. Wife loves it. Placed it overlooking the pond.
customer_reviews.author: VEB

customer_reviews.title: A mighty fine bench.
customer_reviews.text: It's cool sitting on this bench right outside of our front door. I'm seeing neighbors I didn't even know we had.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wenzel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful yard/garden bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. It looks great in my yard facing the garden. A very welcoming place to sit. Very sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: Alchal

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be easy to put together as it only had 4 pieces
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bench to use at my daughter's wedding reception for the photo area. When I got the box to the hall and opened it, I thought it would be easy to put together as it only had 4 pieces. When I was ready to put the last piece on, the welcome back-piece, it was way too short! I'm sending it back for a refund because I shouldn't have to buy longer screws to put a new item together.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Now have 2
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful additive to backyard, we now have 2. Great look, 15 minute assembly for me and sturdy. Worth the little extra than the other ones
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: cute & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered 2 of these!! But - shipping was free- and once we got one put together (VERY EASY by the way), I decided to keep both of them! These are aluminum, and have the look of brushed copper. They are quite sturdy as well - no wobbling. The birds love playing on them during the day!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Skip this product.
customer_reviews.text: This bench looks great but the welding job has much to be desired. Poor workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: PinyJim

customer_reviews.title: Very Stable Bench
customer_reviews.text: We love this bench. The color is bronze and looks very classy. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Badhabits

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful... but
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful and very easy to build, but stained after a week or so of having it out.
customer_reviews.author: Heydi Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Went together very easy and perfect. I saw other reviews that said it didn't go together right. If the back of the bench seems to short you have to make sure the side peices are on the right sides left and right. But this is a nice bench goes together perfect and it looks great. I don't know what I would do without amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Value quality
customer_reviews.text: This looks so elegant in our front breeze way its sturdy made well ..we just love it
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Put together easily. Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The color was not what I expected.I thought I was getting black. It was a bronze color. Put together easily. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, no rust in the rain , 2 people sit on that no problem
customer_reviews.author: phoebe

customer_reviews.title: outdoor bench
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and makes visitors feel welcome. It is also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Appearance awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together very durable I've had for about 3 years now
customer_reviews.author: soccerbumm

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This bench is so cute and easy to put put together.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: It is so attractive from the road!! Welcome!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is very attractive. I am just worried how hot it will be to sit in during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Bayless

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and manage to put it together by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, the price was great, looks nice, sturdy, strong, easy to set up, A+ definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Moon Queen

customer_reviews.title: look and everything as described but once an adult size person size on it you can feel it is not good quality and built
customer_reviews.text: arrive late, look and everything as described but once an adult size person size on it you can feel it is not good quality and built.
customer_reviews.author: terra

customer_reviews.title: This bench is so easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This bench is so easy to put together. Also I am very happy that the quality was better than expected. I have gotten nice complements about the bench and one of my friends is going to purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Nordic

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble with good instructions but because the pieces are a little heavy, it's definitely easier to assemble with one person holding while the other is screwing the pieces together. It feels and looks like great quality. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Malone

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Lovely bench. Lightweight. Flips over in the wind. Need to anchor it if it’s in the open m.
customer_reviews.author: SiGod

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Everyone that passes by my house loves my bench
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: East to assemble, comfortable and came quickly. Looks very nice on our front porch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, solid, looks great, easy to put together, excellent value! I think I've said enough (plus the box came in fine condition--double-boxed, actually).
customer_reviews.author: Wary buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bench
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench! Plenty of room to sit for 2 people, arrived on time and in perfect condition; was very easy to assemble and is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: The bench is a great value more then fairly priced why some folks and complaints or assembly issues. I honestly have no idea. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Rick McGee

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: We finally put this together today, it was easy, the quality is ok, kinda priced high but I liked the color online, it replaced a bench we had on our pouch for over 10 years, it's pretty, love the color but it's not going to last 10 years like our previous bench...
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Termini

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy and the bench looks great.
customer_reviews.text: The bench is by our front door with dark red geraniums on each end. Makes a great welcome to visitors.
customer_reviews.author: bigbobar

customer_reviews.title: Great for backyard
customer_reviews.text: Very good design and looks great. Not so light for aluminum. Color is great.
customer_reviews.author: SKH

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench
customer_reviews.text: Previously I always had wooden benches outside. Every year they needed staining or painting. The metal bench is maintenance free and the price was fantastic. Quite simple to put together. Buy!!! You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: judy oldham ufier

customer_reviews.title: Welcome Bench!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great at my front door.it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne Currie

customer_reviews.title: Directions are backwards but we read other reviews and it went together easily
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. Looks great on the front yard grade
customer_reviews.author: B. Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Attractive bench
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with only a few screws. Solid feel. Does not wobble.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bench.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Very nice finish. Sturdy and well suited for 225 lbs +.
customer_reviews.author: TWBuggie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful seating
customer_reviews.text: What's greater than I expected and love sitting on it to relax and enjoy the evenings
customer_reviews.author: Merida Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Parts don’t go together right
customer_reviews.text: It would have a 5-star review if not for the assembly. The seat had to be mounted on top of the arm frames rather than between the arm frames. Glad my husband is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley R. Lomastro

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE LOOKING BENCH
customer_reviews.text: Well, it rusts. Other than that, it is pretty, I've had it for 1 1/2 years now, very sturdy, rust is only on the back of the bench so it doesn't affect clothing when you sit on it. All in all, it was a great buy for the price and looks beautiful in our yard. My husband sits on it every day, I replaced a wood/metal bench that lasted 9 years before rotting out, I hope to get nine years out of this.
customer_reviews.author: wickedwka

customer_reviews.title: Corner Lot Display
customer_reviews.text: The material and the ease of assembly outstanding. The comfort and design wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Hypes

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, sturdy bench.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bronze type finish. Strong but not heavy. I put it together in about 20 minutes by myself. There are 8 bolts total. I thought assembly was very intuitive, don't really know why some people have trouble. A gift for mother's day and well received. I think it will do well here in central Florida in terms of durability. It's fairly comfortable, boney butts will want a cushion. Light enough for an adult to relocate at will. I'm happy with this buy and can recommend it to others. You can always spend more for bigger/heavier etc., but this bench is quite satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bench for Friends
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench! Easy to put together and looks very nice; durable and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for with easy assembly and delivered straight to my door
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to put together and well-made. Shipping was fast
customer_reviews.author: B Wils girl

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: we bought this in the bronze and it's, it is heavy and so comfortable to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This chair looks good in my backyard now
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks good in my backyard now. Nicely design and quite durable. The reason of 4 stars is because it is very hard to install. My hubby has to forced the screw in. The parts are not perfectly aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husbands barbershop front. Super cute, sturdy. The clients love it.
customer_reviews.author: emi

customer_reviews.title: Missing a bolt
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bench, however there was a bolt missing that connects the back rest to the frame. Trying to contact the seller to get the part.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Charming bench
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. It's beautiful and sturdy. Perfect for our front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: welcome garden seating
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well made.Sprayed it with clear coat to protect from the weather
customer_reviews.author: S. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Porch Bench
customer_reviews.text: My wife just loves the look and construction of her new porch bench. It makes an inviting and very nice compliment to our front entry.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Not A Comfortable Chair
customer_reviews.text: We brought the garden bench for our garden, very solid, beautiful but not very comfortable. we need a cushion to sit for long time.
customer_reviews.author: Prasanna R Gaddam

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Looks good in front of my home. Easy to put together. Price is great
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Bench
customer_reviews.text: Bench arrived as promised. Hardware was included but some of the holes didn't match up so husband had to drill some to make it fit. But bench is together and sits good
customer_reviews.author: marthalcp

customer_reviews.title: Love the bench. Just whst I eanted.
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I was looking for. I love the back of the bench that says welcome. Looks great on my deck. Cost was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Diane J Grzymko

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench. It looks very expensive...pretty easy to assemble. Welcome sign is very large ...you can clearly read it from the street. You won't be disappointed. I have now had bench for a year and left out in a horrible snowiest winter ever (buffalo) and it's still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Savina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks great, super easy to put together and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zury Drucker

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench and really adds curb appeal to my front porch area. It's sturdy and I love the color and the gorgeous design of the back rest.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: welcome
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great. Heavy and comfortable with the optional cushion. Using in a kitchen as extra seating.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.T

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bench, easy to put together, very happy with this choice for front porch!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Blazo

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Very awesome bench. Bought it to put my plants on so the rabbits wouldn't get to them. The rabbits are now on a diet they didn't ask for.
customer_reviews.author: LESLEY A SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Very heavy duty, may need two people to put together. great quality!
customer_reviews.author: MonicaK

customer_reviews.title: good bench for the money
customer_reviews.text: heavy, stable bench. i bought 2. first one set up was smooth. Second one had a problem where screw and pre-thrilled hole dont line up between the base and left arm. I ended up thrill another hole for the screw to go in.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: On my front porch with seasonal pillows....LOVE IT!!!!! Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Looking good, sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Looking good, sturdy and easy to install. I strongly recommend buying this product because of comparatively low price as well good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bench looks great and very easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: James Wenzel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to assemble and very sturdy. Looks adorable on my porch!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Harris

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, solid garden bench
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape. Packaging was a little battered, but the bench was fine. It went together easily. It's a little awkward the way the back panel is so heavy but it was managable.
customer_reviews.author: Delaine S. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for the in laws. Very solid build quality. Fits 3 adults no problem. It's used daily for months and likely last for many many years.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ma

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Went together easily. R arm is when sitting on the bench. Solid. Not a $500.00 bench, but well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Reality Bites

customer_reviews.title: I love my new bench
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bench! We recently purchased oour first home and this looks absolutley beautiful on our front porch! We have already received so many compliments! This bench came exactly how it was described!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Michelle Hofmeister

product_meta.title: Leigh Country TX94101 Metal Welcome Outdoor Bench
product_meta.description: Color:WelcomeLeigh Country Metal Welcome Bench features powder coated steel tubing, welded openings to prevent rust & a unique welcome design across the back of the bench. Designed for maximum comfort while enjoying your patio, porch, deck, yard or garden. Give your home or garden a warm & welcoming feel with this elegantly designed welcome bench. This bench has a durable powder-coated finish to prevent rusting & give it a nice, smooth & friendly texture. A beautiful and confortable furniture addition to your patio, porch, deck, yard or garden. Easy to assemble. Size: 51" length X 24" wide X 34" height. Weight: 37 lbs. Can hold up to 550 lbs.
